function.name: Curl_cookie_add
function.parameter_list:
(struct SessionHandle *data, /* The 'data' pointer here may be NULL at times, and thus must only be used very carefully for things that can deal with data being NULL. Such as infof() and similar */
struct CookieInfo *c, bool httpheader, /* TRUE if HTTP header-style line */ char *lineptr, /* first character of the line */ char *domain, /* default domain */ char *path)
